channel.title: Changing Server?
channel.description: Well, I can log into the default server fine, but that seems to be it, I try to log into another server and it does the Error connection to server thing. :[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 12:44:36 PM[/size][hr]Anyone, please?

item.title: Changing Server?
item.dc:creator: @Owneh Owneh
item.description:
@Owneh wrote:

Start>Controll panel>Network connections>
Localhost 1 (Or if this isnt there 1st one you see) >Right click>Properties>Advanced i think it is, at the top right,> Then look for allow people to connect from the internet from this computer and check that

Read full topic
